 1507:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 1",
 1508: 
 1509:                #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
 1510:                   11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
 1511:                   12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
 1512:                   13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
 1513:                   14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
 1514: 
 1515:                   15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
 1516:                   k16=>a6,k26=>b6,k36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
 1517:                   17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
 1518:                   18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
 1519:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 2" }),
 1520: 
 1521:     {1, "a"} = map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>1,val=>id("a")}),
 1522:     {2, "b"} = map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>2,val=>id("b")}),
 1523:     {3, "c"} = map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>3,val=>id("c")}),
 1524:     {4, "d"} = map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>4,val=>id("d")}),
 1525:     {5, "e"} = map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>5,val=>id("e")}),
 1526: 
 1527:     {1,M1}       = map_guard_sequence_2(M1 = id(M0#{a=>3})),
 1528:     {2,M2}       = map_guard_sequence_2(M2 = id(M0#{a=>4, b=>4})),
 1529:     {3,gg,M3}    = map_guard_sequence_2(M3 = id(M0#{a=>gg, b=>4})),
 1530:     {4,sc,sc,M4} = map_guard_sequence_2(M4 = id(M0#{a=>sc, b=>3, c=>sc2})),
 1531:     {5,kk,kk,M5} = map_guard_sequence_2(M5 = id(M0#{a=>kk, b=>other, c=>sc2})),
 1532: 
 1533:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>6,val=>id("e")})),
 1534:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_2(M0#{b=>5})),
 1535:     ok.
 1536: 
 1537: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=1=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1538: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=2=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1539: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=3=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1540: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=4=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1541: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=5=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val}.
 1542: 
 1543: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=3 }=M) -> {1, M};
 1544: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=4 }=M) -> {2, M};
 1545: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=X, a:=X, b:=4 }=M) -> {3,X,M};
 1546: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=X, a:=Y, b:=3 }=M) when X =:= Y -> {4,X,Y,M};
 1547: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=X, a:=Y }=M) when X =:= Y -> {5,X,Y,M}.
 1548: 
 1549: 
 1550: t_guard_update(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1551:     error  = map_guard_update(#{},#{}),
 1552:     first  = map_guard_update(#{}, #{x=>first}),
 1553:     second = map_guard_update(#{y=>old}, #{x=>second,y=>old}),
 1554:     third  = map_guard_update(#{x=>old,y=>old}, #{x=>third,y=>old}),
 1555:     bad_map_guard_update(),
 1556:     ok.
 1557: 
 1558: t_guard_update_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1559:     M0 = id(#{ 70=>a0,80=>b0,90=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00",03]}=>"10",
 1560:                71=>a1,81=>b1,91=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01",03]}=>"11",
 1561:                72=>a2,82=>b2,92=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02",03]}=>"12",
 1562:                73=>a3,83=>b3,93=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03",03]}=>"13",
 1563:                74=>a4,84=>b4,94=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04",03]}=>"14",
 1564: 
 1565:                75=>a5,85=>b5,95=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05",03]}=>"15",
 1566:                76=>a6,86=>b6,96=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06",03]}=>"16",
 1567:                77=>a7,87=>b7,97=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07",03]}=>"17",
 1568:                78=>a8,88=>b8,98=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08",03]}=>"18",
 1569:                79=>a9,89=>b9,99=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09",03]}=>"19",
 1570: 
 1571:                70.0=>fa0,80.0=>fb0,90.0=>"fc0",
 1572:                71.0=>fa1,81.0=>fb1,91.0=>"fc1",
 1573:                72.0=>fa2,82.0=>fb2,92.0=>"fc2",
 1574:                73.0=>fa3,83.0=>fb3,93.0=>"fc3",
 1575:                74.0=>fa4,84.0=>fb4,94.0=>"fc4",
 1576: 
 1577:                75.0=>fa5,85.0=>fb5,95.0=>"fc5",
 1578:                76.0=>fa6,86.0=>fb6,96.0=>"fc6",
 1579:                77.0=>fa7,87.0=>fb7,97.0=>"fc7",
 1580:                78.0=>fa8,88.0=>fb8,98.0=>"fc8",
 1581:                79.0=>fa9,89.0=>fb9,99.0=>"fc9",
 1582: 
 1583:                #{ one => small, map => key } => "small map key 1",
 1584:                #{ second => small, map => key } => "small map key 2",
 1585:                #{ third => small, map => key } => "small map key 3",
 1586: 
 1587:                #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
 1588:                   11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
 1589:                   12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
 1590:                   13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
 1591:                   14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
 1592: 
 1593:                   15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
 1594:                   16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
 1595:                   17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
 1596:                   18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
 1597:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 1",
 1598: 
 1599:                #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
 1600:                   11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
 1601:                   12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
 1602:                   13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
 1603:                   14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
 1604: 
 1605:                   15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
 1606:                   k16=>a6,k26=>b6,k36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
 1607:                   17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
 1608:                   18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
 1609:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 2" }),
 1610: 
 1611: 
 1612:     error  = map_guard_update(M0#{},M0#{}),
 1613:     first  = map_guard_update(M0#{},M0#{x=>first}),
 1614:     second = map_guard_update(M0#{y=>old}, M0#{x=>second,y=>old}),
 1615:     ok.
 1616: 
 1617: map_guard_update(M1, M2) when M1#{x=>first}  =:= M2 -> first;
 1618: map_guard_update(M1, M2) when M1#{x=>second} =:= M2 -> second;
 1619: map_guard_update(M1, M2) when M1#{x:=third}  =:= M2 -> third;
 1620: map_guard_update(_, _) -> error.
 1621: 
 1622: bad_map_guard_update() ->
 1623:     do_bad_map_guard_update(fun burns/1),
 1624:     do_bad_map_guard_update(fun turns/1),
 1625:     ok.
 1626: 
 1627: do_bad_map_guard_update(Fun) ->
 1628:     do_bad_map_guard_update_1(Fun, #{}),
 1629:     do_bad_map_guard_update_1(Fun, #{true=>1}),
 1630:     ok.
 1631: 
 1632: do_bad_map_guard_update_1(Fun, Value) ->
 1633:     %% Note: The business with the seemingly redundant fun
 1634:     %% disables inlining, which would otherwise change the
 1635:     %% EXIT reason.
 1636:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch Fun(Value)),
 1637:     ok.
 1638: 
 1639: burns(Richmond) when not (Richmond#{true := 0}); [Richmond] ->
 1640:     specification.
 1641: 
 1642: turns(Richmond) when not (Richmond#{true => 0}); [Richmond] ->
 1643:     specification.
 1644: 
 1645: t_guard_receive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1646:     M0  = #{ id => 0 },
 1647:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> guard_receive_loop() end),
 1648:     Big = 36893488147419103229,
 1649:     B1  = <<"some text">>,
 1650:     B2  = <<"was appended">>,
 1651:     B3  = <<B1/binary, B2/binary>>,
 1652: 
 1653:     #{id:=1, res:=Big} = M1 = call(Pid, M0#{op=>sub,in=>{1 bsl 65, 3}}),
 1654:     #{id:=2, res:=26}  = M2 = call(Pid, M1#{op=>idiv,in=>{53,2}}),
 1655:     #{id:=3, res:=832} = M3 = call(Pid, M2#{op=>imul,in=>{26,32}}),
 1656:     #{id:=4, res:=4}   = M4 = call(Pid, M3#{op=>add,in=>{1,3}}),
 1657:     #{id:=5, res:=Big} = M5 = call(Pid, M4#{op=>sub,in=>{1 bsl 65, 3}}),
 1658:     #{id:=6, res:=B3}  = M6 = call(Pid, M5#{op=>"append",in=>{B1,B2}}),
 1659:     #{id:=7, res:=4}   = _  = call(Pid, M6#{op=>add,in=>{1,3}}),
 1660: 
 1661: 
 1662:     %% update old maps and check id update
 1663:     #{id:=2, res:=B3} = call(Pid, M1#{op=>"append",in=>{B1,B2}}),
 1664:     #{id:=5, res:=99} = call(Pid, M4#{op=>add,in=>{33, 66}}),
 1665: 
 1666:     %% cleanup
 1667:     done = call(Pid, done),
 1668:     ok.
 1669: 
 1670: -define(t_guard_receive_large_procs, 1500).
 1671: 
 1672: t_guard_receive_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1673:     M = lists:foldl(fun(_,#{procs := Ps } = M) ->
 1674:                             M#{ procs := Ps#{ spawn_link(fun() -> grecv_loop() end) => 0 }}
 1675:                     end, #{procs => #{}, done => 0}, lists:seq(1,?t_guard_receive_large_procs)),
 1676:     lists:foreach(fun(Pid) ->
 1677:                           Pid ! {self(), hello}
 1678:                   end, maps:keys(maps:get(procs,M))),
 1679:     ok = guard_receive_large_loop(M),
 1680:     ok.
 1681: 
 1682: guard_receive_large_loop(#{done := ?t_guard_receive_large_procs}) ->
 1683:     ok;
 1684: guard_receive_large_loop(M) ->
 1685:     receive
 1686:         #{pid := Pid, msg := hello} ->
 1687:             case M of
 1688:                 #{done := Count, procs := #{Pid := 150}} ->
 1689:                     Pid ! {self(), done},
 1690:                     guard_receive_large_loop(M#{done := Count + 1});
 1691:                 #{procs := #{Pid := Count} = Ps} ->
 1692:                     Pid ! {self(), hello},
 1693:                     guard_receive_large_loop(M#{procs := Ps#{Pid := Count + 1}})
 1694:             end
 1695:     end.
 1696: 
 1697: grecv_loop() ->
 1698:     receive
 1699:         {_, done} ->
 1700:             ok;
 1701:         {Pid, hello} ->
 1702:             Pid ! #{pid=>self(), msg=>hello},
 1703:             grecv_loop()
 1704:     end.
 1705: 
 1706: 
 1707: call(Pid, M) ->
 1708:     Pid ! {self(), M}, receive {Pid, Res} -> Res end.
 1709: 
 1710: guard_receive_loop() ->
 1711:     receive
 1712: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:="append", in:={X,Y}}=M} when is_binary(X), is_binary(Y) ->
 1713: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=><<X/binary,Y/binary>>}},
 1714: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1715: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=add, in:={X,Y}}} ->
 1716: 	    Pid ! {self(), #{ id=>Id+1, res=>X+Y}},
 1717: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1718: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=sub,  in:={X,Y}}=M} ->
 1719: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=>X-Y}},
 1720: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1721: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=idiv, in:={X,Y}}=M} ->
 1722: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=>X div Y}},
 1723: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1724: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=imul, in:={X,Y}}=M} ->
 1725: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=>X * Y}},
 1726: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1727: 	{Pid, done} ->
 1728: 	    Pid ! {self(), done};
 1729: 	{Pid, Other} ->
 1730: 	    Pid ! {error, Other},
 1731: 	    guard_receive_loop()
 1732:     end.
 1733: 
 1734: 
 1735: t_list_comprehension(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1736:     [#{k:=1},#{k:=2},#{k:=3}] = id([#{k=>I} || I <- [1,2,3]]),
 1737:     Ls = id([#{<<2:301>> => I, "wat" => I + 1} || I <- [1,2,3]]),
 1738:     [#{<<2:301>>:=1,"wat":=2},#{<<2:301>>:=2,"wat":=3},#{<<2:301>>:=3,"wat":=4}] = Ls,
 1739:     [{1,2},{2,3},{3,4}] = id([{I2,I1} || #{"wat" := I1, <<2:301>> := I2} <- Ls]),
 1740: 
 1741:     Ks = lists:seq($a,$z),
 1742:     Ms = [#{[K1,K2]=>{K1,K2}} || K1 <- Ks, K2 <- Ks],
 1743:     [#{"aa" := {$a,$a}},#{"ab":={$a,$b}}|_] = Ms,
 1744:     [#{"zz" := {$z,$z}},#{"zy":={$z,$y}}|_] = lists:reverse(Ms),
 1745:     ok.
 1746: 
 1747: t_guard_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1748:     F1 = fun
 1749: 	    (#{s:=v,v:=V})     -> {v,V};
 1750: 	    (#{s:=t,v:={V,V}}) -> {t,V};
 1751: 	    (#{s:=l,v:=[V,V]}) -> {l,V}
 1752:     end,
 1753:     
 1754:     F2 = fun
 1755: 	    (#{s:=T,v:={V,V}}) -> {T,V};
 1756: 	    (#{s:=T,v:=[V,V]}) -> {T,V};
 1757: 	    (#{s:=T,v:=V})     -> {T,V}
 1758:     end,
 1759:     V = <<"hi">>,
 1760: 
 1761:     {v,V} = F1(#{s=>v,v=>V}),
 1762:     {t,V} = F1(#{s=>t,v=>{V,V}}),
 1763:     {l,V} = F1(#{s=>l,v=>[V,V]}),
 1764: 
 1765:     {v,V} = F2(#{s=>v,v=>V}),
 1766:     {t,V} = F2(#{s=>t,v=>{V,V}}),
 1767:     {l,V} = F2(#{s=>l,v=>[V,V]}),
 1768: 
 1769:     %% error case
 1770:     case (catch F1(#{s=>none,v=>none})) of
 1771: 	{'EXIT', {function_clause,[{?MODULE,_,[#{s:=none,v:=none}],_}|_]}} -> ok;
 1772: 	{'EXIT', {{case_clause,_},_}} -> {comment,inlined};
 1773: 	Other ->
 1774: 	    ct:fail({no_match, Other})
 1775:     end.
 1776: 
 1777: 
 1778: t_map_sort_literals(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1779:     % test relation
 1780: 
 1781:     %% size order
 1782:     true  = #{ a => 1, b => 2} < id(#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1}),
 1783:     true  = #{ b => 1, a => 1} < id(#{ c => 1, a => 1, b => 1}),
 1784:     false = #{ c => 1, b => 1, a => 1} < id(#{ c => 1, a => 1}),
 1785: 
 1786:     %% key order
 1787:     true  = id(#{ a => 1 }) < id(#{ b => 1}),
 1788:     false = id(#{ b => 1 }) < id(#{ a => 1}),
 1789:     true  = id(#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1 }) < id(#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1}),
 1790:     true  = id(#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1 }) > id(#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1}),
 1791:     true  = id(#{ c => 1, b => 1, a => 1 }) < id(#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1}),
 1792:     true  = id(#{ "a" => 1 }) < id(#{ <<"a">> => 1}),
 1793:     false = id(#{ <<"a">> => 1 }) < id(#{ "a" => 1}),
 1794:     true = id(#{ 1 => 1 }) < id(#{ 1.0 => 1}),
 1795:     false = id(#{ 1.0 => 1 }) < id(#{ 1 => 1}),
 1796: 
 1797:     %% value order
 1798:     true  = id(#{ a => 1 }) < id(#{ a => 2}),
 1799:     false = id(#{ a => 2 }) < id(#{ a => 1}),
 1800:     false = id(#{ a => 2, b => 1 }) < id(#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1801:     true  = id(#{ a => 1, b => 1 }) < id(#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1802: 
 1803:     true  = id(#{ "a" => "hi", b => 134 }) == id(#{ b => 134,"a" => "hi"}),
 1804: 
 1805:     %% lists:sort
 1806: 
 1807:     SortVs = [#{"a"=>1},#{a=>2},#{1=>3},#{<<"a">>=>4}],
 1808:     [#{1:=ok},#{a:=ok},#{"a":=ok},#{<<"a">>:=ok}] = lists:sort([#{"a"=>ok},#{a=>ok},#{1=>ok},#{<<"a">>=>ok}]),
 1809:     [#{1:=3},#{a:=2},#{"a":=1},#{<<"a">>:=4}] = lists:sort(SortVs),
 1810:     [#{1:=3},#{a:=2},#{"a":=1},#{<<"a">>:=4}] = lists:sort(lists:reverse(SortVs)),
 1811: 
 1812:     ok.
 1813: 
 1814: t_warn_pair_key_overloaded(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1815:     #{ "hi1" := 42 } = id(#{ "hi1" => 1, "hi1" => 42 }),
 1816: 
 1817:     #{ "hi1" := 1337, "hi2" := [2], "hi3" := 3 } = id(#{
 1818: 	    "hi1" => erlang:atom_to_binary(?MODULE,utf8),
 1819: 	    "hi1" => erlang:binary_to_atom(<<"wazzup">>,utf8),
 1820: 	    "hi1" => erlang:binary_to_float(<<"3.1416">>),
 1821: 	    "hi1" => erlang:float_to_binary(3.1416),
 1822: 	    "hi2" => erlang:pid_to_list(self()),
 1823: 	    "hi3" => erlang:float_to_binary(3.1416),
 1824: 	    "hi2" => lists:subtract([1,2],[1]),
 1825: 	    "hi3" => +3,
 1826: 	    "hi1" => erlang:min(1,2),
 1827: 	    "hi1" => erlang:phash({1,2},33),
 1828: 	    "hi1" => erlang:phash2({1,2},34),
 1829: 	    "hi1" => erlang:integer_to_binary(1337),
 1830: 	    "hi1" => erlang:binary_to_integer(<<"1337">>),
 1831: 	    "hi4" => erlang:float_to_binary(3.1416)
 1832: 	}),
 1833:     ok.
 1834: 
 1835: t_warn_useless_build(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1836:     [#{ a => id(I)} || I <- [1,2,3]],
 1837:     ok.
 1838: 
 1839: t_build_and_match_over_alloc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1840:     Ls = id([1,2,3]),
 1841:     V0 = [a|Ls],
 1842:     M0 = id(#{ "a" => V0 }),
 1843:     #{ "a" := V1 } = M0,
 1844:     V2 = id([c|Ls]),
 1845:     M2 = id(#{ "a" => V2 }),
 1846:     #{ "a" := V3 } = M2,
 1847:     {[a,1,2,3],[c,1,2,3]} = id({V1,V3}),
 1848:     ok.
 1849: 
 1850: t_build_and_match_empty_val(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1851:     F = fun(#{ "hi":=_,{1,2}:=_,1337:=_}) -> ok end,
 1852:     ok = F(id(#{"hi"=>ok,{1,2}=>ok,1337=>ok})),
 1853: 
 1854:     %% error case
 1855:     case (catch (F(id(#{"hi"=>ok})))) of
 1856: 	{'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} -> ok;
 1857: 	{'EXIT', {{case_clause,_},_}} -> {comment,inlined};
 1858: 	Other ->
 1859: 	    ct:fail({no_match, Other})
 1860:     end.
 1861: 
 1862: t_build_and_match_val(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1863:     F = fun
 1864: 	(#{ "hi" := first,  v := V}) -> {1,V};
 1865: 	(#{ "hi" := second, v := V}) -> {2,V}
 1866:     end,
 1867: 
 1868: 
 1869:     {1,"hello"}  = F(id(#{"hi"=>first,v=>"hello"})),
 1870:     {2,"second"} = F(id(#{"hi"=>second,v=>"second"})),
 1871: 
 1872:     %% error case
 1873:     case (catch (F(id(#{"hi"=>ok})))) of
 1874: 	{'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} -> ok;
 1875: 	{'EXIT', {{case_clause,_},_}} -> {comment,inlined};
 1876: 	Other ->
 1877: 	    ct:fail({no_match, Other})
 1878:     end.
 1879: 
 1880: t_build_and_match_nil(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1881:     %% literals removed the coverage
 1882:     V1 = id(cookie),
 1883:     V2 = id(cake),
 1884:     V3 = id(crisps),
 1885: 
 1886:     #{ [] := V1, "treat" := V2, {your,treat} := V3 } = id(#{
 1887: 	    {your,treat} => V3,
 1888: 	    "treat" => V2, 
 1889: 	    [] => V1 }),
 1890:     #{ [] := V3, [] := V3 } = id(#{ [] => V1, [] => V3 }),
 1891:     #{ <<1>> := V3, [] := V1 } = id(#{ [] => V1, <<1>> => V3 }),
 1892:     ok.
 1893: 
 1894: t_build_and_match_structure(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1895:     V2 = id("it"),
 1896:     S = id([42,{"hi", "=)", #{ "a" => 42, any => any, val => "get_" ++ V2}}]),
 1897: 
 1898:     %% match deep map values
 1899:     V2 = case S of
 1900: 	[42,{"hi",_, #{ "a" := 42, val := "get_" ++ V1, any := _ }}] -> V1
 1901:     end,
 1902:     %% match deep map
 1903:     ok = case S of
 1904: 	[42,{"hi",_, #{ }}] -> ok
 1905:     end,
 1906:     ok.
 1907: 
 1908: %% simple build and match variables
 1909: t_build_and_match_variables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1910:     K0 = id(#{}),
 1911:     K1 = id(1),       V1 = id(a),
 1912:     K2 = id(2),       V2 = id(b),
 1913:     K3 = id(3),       V3 = id("c"),
 1914:     K4 = id("4"),     V4 = id("d"),
 1915:     K5 = id(<<"5">>), V5 = id(<<"e">>),
 1916:     K6 = id({"6",7}), V6 = id("f"),
 1917:     K7 = id(#{ "a" => 3 }),
 1918:     #{K1:=V1} = id(#{K1=>V1}),
 1919:     #{K1:=V1,K2:=V2} = id(#{K1=>V1,K2=>V2}),
 1920:     #{K1:=V1,K2:=V2,K3:=V3} = id(#{K1=>V1,K2=>V2,K3=>V3}),
 1921:     #{K1:=V1,K2:=V2,K3:=V3,K4:=V4} = id(#{K1=>V1,K2=>V2,K3=>V3,K4=>V4}),
 1922:     #{K1:=V1,K2:=V2,K3:=V3,K4:=V4,K5:=V5} = id(#{K1=>V1,K2=>V2,K3=>V3,K4=>V4,K5=>V5}),
 1923:     #{K1:=V1,K2:=V2,K3:=V3,K4:=V4,K5:=V5,K6:=V6} = id(#{K1=>V1,K2=>V2,K3=>V3,K4=>V4,K5=>V5,K6=>V6}),
 1924: 
 1925:     #{K5:=X,K5:=X=3,K4:=4} = id(#{K5=>3,K4=>4}),
 1926:     #{K5:=X,<<"5">>:=X=3,K4:=4} = id(#{K5=>3,K4=>4}),
 1927:     #{K5:=X,<<"5">>:=X=3,K4:=4} = id(#{<<"5">>=>3,K4=>4}),
 1928: 
 1929:     #{ K4:=#{ K3:=#{K1:=V1, K2:=V2}}, K5:=V5} =
 1930: 	id(#{ K5=>V5, K4=>#{ K3=>#{K2 => V2, K1 => V1}}}),
 1931:     #{ K4 := #{ K5 := Res }, K6 := Res} = id(#{K4=>#{K5 => 99}, K6 => 99}),
 1932: 
 1933:     %% has keys
 1934:     #{a :=_,b :=_,K1:=_,K2:=_,K3:=V3,K4:=ResKey,K4:=ResKey,"4":=ResKey,"4":="ok"} =
 1935: 	id(#{ a=>1, b=>1, K1=>V1, K2=>V2, K3=>V3, K4=>"nope", "4"=>"ok" }),
 1936: 
 1937:     %% function
 1938:     ok = match_function_map_neg_keys(#{ -1 => a, -2 => b, -3 => c }),
 1939: 
 1940:     %% map key
 1941:     #{ K0 := 42 } = id(#{ K0 => 42 }),
 1942:     #{ K7 := 42 } = id(#{ K7 => 42 }),
 1943: 
 1944:     %% nil key
 1945:     KNIL = id([]),
 1946:     #{KNIL:=ok,1:=2} = id(#{KNIL=>ok,1=>2}),
 1947: 
 1948:     Bin = <<0:258>>,
 1949:     #{ Bin := "three" } = id(#{<<0:258>> =>"three"}),
 1950: 
 1951:     %% error case
 1952:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{K5:=3,x:=2} = id(#{K5=>3}))),
 1953:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{K5:=2} = id(#{K5=>3}))),
 1954:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{K5:=3} = id({a,b,c}))),
 1955:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{K5:=3} = id(#{K6=>3}))),
 1956:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{K5:=3} = id(K7))),
 1957:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{K7:=3} = id(#{K7=>42}))),
 1958:     ok.
 1959: 
 1960: 
 1961: match_function_map_neg_keys(#{ -1 := a, -2 := b, -3 := c }) -> ok.
 1962: 
 1963: t_update_assoc_variables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1964:     K1 = id(1),
 1965:     K2 = id(2),
 1966:     K3 = id(3.0),
 1967:     K4 = id(4),
 1968:     K5 = id(5),
 1969:     K6 = id(2.0),
 1970: 
 1971:     M0 = #{K1=>a,K2=>b,K3=>c,K4=>d,K5=>e},
 1972: 
 1973:     M1 = M0#{K1=>42,K2=>100,K4=>[a,b,c]},
 1974:     #{1:=42,2:=100,3.0:=c,4:=[a,b,c],5:=e} = M1,
 1975:     #{1:=42,2:=b,4:=d,5:=e,2.0:=100,K3:=c,4.0:=[a,b,c]} = M0#{1.0=>float,1:=42,2.0=>wrong,K6=>100,4.0=>[a,b,c]},
 1976: 
 1977:     M2 = M0#{K3=>new},
 1978:     #{1:=a,2:=b,K3:=new,4:=d,5:=e} = M2,
 1979:     M2 = M0#{3.0:=wrong,K3=>new},
 1980: 
 1981:     #{ <<0:258>> := val } = id(M0#{<<0:258>> => val}), %% binary limitation
 1982: 
 1983:     %% Errors cases.
 1984:     BadMap = id(badmap),
 1985:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,BadMap},_}} = (catch BadMap#{nonexisting=>val}),
 1986:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,<<>>},_}} = (catch <<>>#{nonexisting=>val}),
 1987:     ok.
 1988: 
 1989: t_update_exact_variables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1990:     K1 = id(1),
 1991:     K2 = id(2),
 1992:     K3 = id(3.0),
 1993:     K4 = id(4),
 1994: 
 1995:     M0 = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3.0=>c,4=>d,5=>e}),
 1996: 
 1997:     M1 = M0#{K1:=42,K2:=100,K4:=[a,b,c]},
 1998:     #{1:=42,2:=100,3.0:=c,K4:=[a,b,c],5:=e} = M1,
 1999:     M1 = M0#{K1:=wrong,1:=also_wrong,K1=>42,2=>wrong,K2:=100,4:=[a,b,c]},
 2000: 
 2001:     M2 = M0#{K3:=new},
 2002:     #{1:=a,K2:=b,3.0:=new,K4:=d,5:=e} = M2,
 2003:     M2 = M0#{3.0=>wrong,K3:=new},
 2004:     true = M2 =/= M0#{3=>right,3.0:=new},
 2005:     #{ 3 := right, 3.0 := new } = M0#{3=>right,K3:=new},
 2006: 
 2007:     M3 = id(#{ 1 => val}),
 2008:     #{1 := update2,1.0 := new_val4} = M3#{
 2009: 	1.0 => new_val1, K1 := update, K1=> update3,
 2010: 	K1 := update2, 1.0 := new_val2, 1.0 => new_val3,
 2011: 	1.0 => new_val4 },
 2012: 
 2013:     #{ "wat" := 3, 2 := a } = id(#{ "wat" => 1, K2 => 2 }#{ K2 := a, "wat" := 3 }),
 2014: 
 2015:     %% Errors cases.
 2016:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,nil},_}} = (catch ((id(nil))#{ a := b })),
 2017:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,nonexisting},_}} = (catch M0#{nonexisting:=val}),
 2018:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,1.0},_}} = (catch M0#{1.0:=v,1.0=>v2}),
 2019:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,42},_}} = (catch M0#{42.0:=v,42:=v2}),
 2020:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,42.0},_}} = (catch M0#{42=>v1,42.0:=v2,42:=v3}),
 2021:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,<<>>},_}} = (catch <<>>#{nonexisting:=val}),
 2022:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,<<0:257>>},_}} =
 2023: 	(catch M0#{<<0:257>> := val}),		%limitation
 2024:     ok.
 2025: 
 2026: t_nested_pattern_expressions(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2027:     K1 = id("hello"),
 2028:     %K2 = id({ok}),
 2029:     [_,_,#{ <<"hi">> := wat, K1 := 42 }|_] = id([k,k,#{<<"hi">> => wat, K1 => 42}]),
 2030:     [_,_,#{ -1 := wat, K1 := 42 }|_] = id([k,k,#{-1 => wat, K1 => 42}]),
 2031:     [_,_,{#{ -1 := #{ {-3,<<0:300>>} := V1 }, K1 := 42 },3}|_] = id([k,k,{#{-1 => #{{-3,<<0:300>>}=>"hi"}, K1 => 42},3}]),
 2032:     "hi" = V1,
 2033:     %[k,#{ {-1,K1,[]} := {wat,K1}, K2 := 42 }|_] = id([k,#{{-1,K1,[]} => {wat,K1}, K2 => 42}]),
 2034:     %[k,#{ [-1,K2,[]] := {wat,K1}, K1 := 42 }|_] = id([k,#{[-1,K2,[]] => {wat,K1}, K1 => 42}]),
 2035: 
 2036:     M0 = id(#{ <<33:333>> => 1, <<332:333>> => ok, a => ok, wat => yep, watzor => ok }),
 2037:     F0 = map_nested_pattern_funs(M0),
 2038:     F1 = F0(wat),
 2039:     F2 = F1(watzor),
 2040:     {yep,ok} = F2(M0),
 2041: 
 2042:     %% Test matching of nested maps. There used to be an unsafe optimization in beam_peep.
 2043:     #{ <<"result">> := #{<<"foo">> := <<"6">> } } =
 2044:         nested_map(),
 2045: 
 2046:     InnerMap = #{a => id({a,value})},
 2047:     OuterMap = #{inner_map => InnerMap},
 2048:     #{inner_map := #{a := {a,value}}} = OuterMap,
 2049: 
 2050:     ok.
 2051: 
 2052: map_nested_pattern_funs(M) ->
 2053:     K0 = id(a),
 2054:     fun(K1) ->
 2055: 	    case M of
 2056: 		#{ K0 := ok, K1 := yep, <<33:333>> := 1 } ->
 2057: 		    fun(K2) ->
 2058: 			    case M of
 2059: 				#{ K2 := ok, K1 := yep, <<33:333>> := 1 } ->
 2060: 				    fun
 2061: 					(#{ <<332:333>> := ok, K1 := V1, K2 := V2 }) ->
 2062: 					    {V1,V2}
 2063: 				    end
 2064: 			    end
 2065: 		    end
 2066: 	    end
 2067:     end.
 2068: 
 2069: nested_map() ->
 2070:     #{ <<"result">> := #{<<"foo">> := <<"6">> } } =
 2071:         #{ <<"result">> => #{<<"foo">> => <<"6">> } }.
 2072: 
 2073: t_guard_update_variables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2074:     error  = map_guard_update_variables(n,#{},#{}),
 2075:     first  = map_guard_update_variables(x,#{}, #{x=>first}),
 2076:     second = map_guard_update_variables(x,#{y=>old}, #{x=>second,y=>old}),
 2077:     third  = map_guard_update_variables(x,#{x=>old,y=>old}, #{x=>third,y=>old}),
 2078:     fourth = map_guard_update_variables(x,#{x=>old,y=>old}, #{x=>4,y=>new}),
 2079:     ok.
 2080: 
 2081: map_guard_update_variables(K,M1,M2) when M1#{K=>first}    =:= M2 -> first;
 2082: map_guard_update_variables(K,M1,M2) when M1#{K=>second}   =:= M2 -> second;
 2083: map_guard_update_variables(K,M1,M2) when M1#{K:=third}    =:= M2 -> third;
 2084: map_guard_update_variables(K,M1,M2) when M1#{K:=4,y=>new} =:= M2 -> fourth;
 2085: map_guard_update_variables(_,_,_) -> error.
 2086: 
 2087: t_guard_sequence_variables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2088:     {1,"a"} = map_guard_sequence_var_1(a,#{seq=>1,a=>id("a"),b=>no}),
 2089:     {2,"b"} = map_guard_sequence_var_1(b,#{seq=>2,b=>id("b"),a=>no}),
 2090:     {3,"c"} = map_guard_sequence_var_1(a,#{seq=>3,a=>id("c"),b=>no}),
 2091:     {4,"d"} = map_guard_sequence_var_1(b,#{seq=>4,b=>id("d"),a=>no}),
 2092:     {4,4}   = map_guard_sequence_var_1(seq,#{seq=>4}),
 2093:     {4,4,y} = map_guard_sequence_var_1(seq,#{seq=>4,b=>id("d"),a=>y}),
 2094:     {5,"d"} = map_guard_sequence_var_1(b,#{seq=>5,b=>id("d"),a=>y}),
 2095: 
 2096:     %% error case
 2097:     {'EXIT',{{case_clause,_},_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_var_1("a",#{seq=>4,val=>id("e")})),
 2098:     ok.
 2099: 
 2100: 
 2101: map_guard_sequence_var_1(K,M) ->
 2102:     case M of
 2103: 	#{seq:=1=Seq, K:=Val} -> {Seq,Val};
 2104: 	#{seq:=2=Seq, K:=Val} -> {Seq,Val};
 2105: 	#{seq:=3=Seq, K:=Val} -> {Seq,Val};
 2106: 	#{K:=4=Seq,   K:=Val1,a:=Val2} -> {Seq,Val1,Val2};
 2107: 	#{seq:=4=Seq, K:=Val} -> {Seq,Val};
 2108: 	#{K:=4=Seq,   K:=Val} -> {Seq,Val};
 2109: 	#{seq:=5=Seq, K:=Val} -> {Seq,Val}
 2110:     end.
 2111: 
 2112: 
 2113: t_guard_sequence_mixed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2114:     M0 = id(#{ a=>1, b=>1, c=>1, d=>1, e=>1, f=>1, g=>1, h=>1 }),
 2115:     M1 = id(M0#{ d := 3 }),
 2116:     1 = map_guard_sequence_mixed(a,d,M1),
 2117:     M2 = id(M1#{ b := 2, d := 4, h := 2 }),
 2118:     2 = map_guard_sequence_mixed(a,d,M2),
 2119:     M3 = id(M2#{ b := 3, e := 5, g := 3 }),
 2120:     3 = map_guard_sequence_mixed(a,e,M3),
 2121:     M4 = id(M3#{ c := 4, e := 6, h := 1 }),
 2122:     4 = map_guard_sequence_mixed(a,e,M4),
 2123:     M5 = id(M4#{ c := 5, f := 7, g := 2 }),
 2124:     5 = map_guard_sequence_mixed(a,f,M5),
 2125:     M6 = id(M5#{ c := 6, f := 8, h := 3 }),
 2126:     6 = map_guard_sequence_mixed(a,f,M6),
 2127: 
 2128:     %% error case
 2129:     {'EXIT',{{case_clause,_},_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_mixed(a,b,M0)),
 2130:     ok.
 2131: 
 2132: map_guard_sequence_mixed(K1,K2,M) ->
 2133:     case M of
 2134: 	#{ K1 := 1, b := 1, K2 := 3, g := 1} -> 1;
 2135: 	#{ K1 := 1, b := 2, K2 := 4, h := 2} -> 2;
 2136: 	#{ K1 := 1, b := 3, K2 := 5, g := 3} -> 3;
 2137: 	#{ K1 := 1, c := 4, K2 := 6, h := 1} -> 4;
 2138: 	#{ K1 := 1, c := 5, K2 := 7, g := 2} -> 5;
 2139: 	#{ K1 := 1, c := 6, K2 := 8, h := 3} -> 6
 2140:     end.
 2141: 
 2142: %% register corruption discovered in 18 due to
 2143: %% get_map_elements might destroys registers when fail-label is taken.
 2144: %% Only seen when patterns have two targets,
 2145: %% specifically: we copy one register, and then jump.
 2146: %%    {test,is_map,{f,5},[{x,1}]}.
 2147: %%
 2148: %%    {get_map_elements,{f,7},{x,1},{list,[{atom,a},{x,1},{atom,b},{x,2}]}}.
 2149: %%    %% if 'a' exists but not 'b' {x,1} is overwritten, jump {f,7}
 2150: %%
 2151: %%    {move,{integer,1},{x,0}}.
 2152: %%    {call_only,3,{f,10}}.
 2153: %%
 2154: %%  {label,7}.
 2155: %%    {get_map_elements,{f,8},{x,1},{list,[{atom,b},{x,2}]}}.
 2156: %%    %% {x,1} (src) is now corrupt
 2157: %%
 2158: %%    {move,{x,0},{x,1}}.
 2159: %%    {move,{integer,2},{x,0}}.
 2160: %%    {call_only,3,{f,10}}.
 2161: %%
 2162: %% Only happens in beam_block opt_move pass with two destinations.
 2163: 
 2164: t_register_corruption(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2165:     M = #{a=> <<"value">>, c=>3},
 2166:     {3,wanted,<<"value">>} = register_corruption_bar(M,wanted),
 2167:     {3,wanted,<<"value">>} = register_corruption_foo(wanted,M),
 2168:     ok.
 2169: 
 2170: register_corruption_foo(_,#{a := V1, b := V2}) ->
 2171:     register_corruption_dummy_call(1,V1,V2);
 2172: register_corruption_foo(A,#{b := V}) ->
 2173:     register_corruption_dummy_call(2,A,V);
 2174: register_corruption_foo(A,#{a := V}) ->
 2175:     register_corruption_dummy_call(3,A,V).
 2176: 
 2177: register_corruption_bar(M,A) ->
 2178:     case M of
 2179:         #{a := V1, b := V2} ->
 2180:             register_corruption_dummy_call(1,V1,V2);
 2181:         #{b := V} ->
 2182:             register_corruption_dummy_call(2,A,V);
 2183:         #{a := V} ->
 2184:             register_corruption_dummy_call(3,A,V)
 2185:     end.
 2186: 
 2187: 
 2188: register_corruption_dummy_call(A,B,C) -> {A,B,C}.
 2189: 
 2190: 
 2191: t_frequency_table(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2192:     rand:seed(exsplus, {13,1337,54}),		% pseudo random
 2193:     N = 100000,
 2194:     Ts = rand_terms(N),
 2195:     #{ n:=N, tf := Tf } = frequency_table(Ts,#{ n=>0, tf => #{}}),
 2196:     ok = check_frequency(Ts,Tf),
 2197:     ok.
 2198: 
 2199: 
 2200: frequency_table([T|Ts], M) ->
 2201:     case M of
 2202: 	#{ n := N, tf := #{ T := C } = F } ->
 2203: 	    frequency_table(Ts,M#{ n := N + 1, tf := F#{ T := C + 1 }});
 2204: 	#{ n := N, tf := F } ->
 2205: 	    frequency_table(Ts,M#{ n := N + 1, tf := F#{ T => 1 }})
 2206:     end;
 2207: frequency_table([], M) -> M.
 2208: 
 2209: 
 2210: check_frequency(Ts,Tf) ->
 2211:     check_frequency(Ts,Tf,dict:new()).
 2212: 
 2213: check_frequency([T|Ts],Tf,D) ->
 2214:     case dict:find(T,D) of
 2215: 	error  -> check_frequency(Ts,Tf,dict:store(T,1,D));
 2216: 	{ok,C} -> check_frequency(Ts,Tf,dict:store(T,C+1,D))
 2217:     end;
 2218: check_frequency([],Tf,D) ->
 2219:     validate_frequency(dict:to_list(D),Tf).
 2220: 
 2221: validate_frequency([{T,C}|Fs],Tf) ->
 2222:     case Tf of
 2223: 	#{ T := C } -> validate_frequency(Fs,Tf);
 2224: 	_ -> error
 2225:     end;
 2226: validate_frequency([], _) -> ok.
 2227: 
 2228: 
 2229: t_bad_update(_Config) ->
 2230:     {#{0.0:=Id},#{}} = properly(#{}),
 2231:     42 = Id(42),
 2232:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,_},_}} = (catch increase(0)),
 2233:     ok.
 2234: 
 2235: properly(Item) ->
 2236:     {Item#{0.0 => fun id/1},Item}.
 2237: 
 2238: increase(Allows) ->
 2239:     catch fun() -> Allows end#{[] => +Allows, "warranty" => fun id/1}.
 2240: 
 2241: t_reused_key_variable(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2242:     Key = id(key),
 2243:     Map1 = id(#{Key=>Config}),
 2244:     Map2 = id(#{Key=>Config}),
 2245:     case {Map1,Map2} of
 2246:         %% core_lint treated Key as pattern variables, not input variables,
 2247:         %% and complained about the variable being duplicated.
 2248:         {#{Key:=Same},#{Key:=Same}} ->
 2249:             ok
 2250:     end.
 2251: 
 2252: t_mixed_clause(_Config) ->
 2253:     put(fool_inliner, x),
 2254:     K = get(fool_inliner),
 2255:     {42,100} = case #{K=>42,y=>100} of
 2256:                    #{x:=X,y:=Y} ->
 2257:                        {X,Y}
 2258:                end,
 2259:     nomatch = case #{K=>42,y=>100} of
 2260:                   #{x:=X,y:=0} ->
 2261:                       {X,Y};
 2262:                   #{} ->
 2263:                       nomatch
 2264:               end,
 2265:     ok.
 2266: 
 2267: cover_beam_trim(_Config) ->
 2268:     val = do_cover_beam_trim(id, max, max, id, #{id=>val}),
 2269:     ok.
 2270: 
 2271: do_cover_beam_trim(Id, OldMax, Max, Id, M) ->
 2272:     OldMax = id(Max),
 2273:     #{Id:=Val} = id(M),
 2274:     Val.
 2275: 
 2276: t_key_expressions(_Config) ->
 2277:     Int = id(42),
 2278:     #{{tag,Int} := 42} = id(#{{tag,Int} => 42}),
 2279:     #{{tag,Int+1} := 42} = id(#{{tag,Int+1} => 42}),
 2280:     #{{a,b} := x, {tag,Int} := 42, Int := 0} =
 2281:         id(#{{a,b} => x, {tag,Int} => 42, Int => 0}),
 2282: 
 2283:     F1 = fun(#{Int + 1 := Val}) -> Val end,
 2284:     val = F1(#{43 => val}),
 2285:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch F1(a)),
 2286: 
 2287:     F2 = fun(M, X, Y) ->
 2288:                  case M of
 2289:                      #{element(X, Y) := <<Sz:16,Bin:Sz/binary>>} ->
 2290:                          Bin;
 2291:                      #{} ->
 2292:                          not_found;
 2293:                      {A,B} ->
 2294:                          A + B
 2295:                  end
 2296:          end,
 2297:     <<"xyz">> = F2(#{b => <<3:16,"xyz">>}, 2, {a,b,c}),
 2298:     not_found = F2(#{b => <<3:16,"xyz">>}, 999, {a,b,c}),
 2299:     13 = F2({6,7}, 1, 2),
 2300: 
 2301:     #{<<""/utf8>> := 1} = id(#{<<""/utf8>> => 1}),
 2302: 
 2303:     F3 = fun(Arg) ->
 2304:                  erase(once),
 2305:                  RunOnce = fun(I) ->
 2306:                                    undefined = put(once, twice),
 2307:                                    id(I)
 2308:                            end,
 2309:                  case RunOnce(Arg) of
 2310:                      #{{tag,<<Int:42>>} := Value} -> Value;
 2311:                      {X,Y} -> X + Y
 2312:                  end
 2313:          end,
 2314:     10 = F3({7,3}),
 2315:     whatever = F3(#{{tag,<<Int:42>>} => whatever}),
 2316: 
 2317:     F4 = fun(K1, K2, M) ->
 2318:                  case M of
 2319:                      #{K1 div K2 := V} -> V;
 2320:                      #{} -> no_match
 2321:                  end
 2322:          end,
 2323:     value = F4(42, 21, #{2 => value}),
 2324:     no_match = F4(42, 21, #{}),
 2325:     no_match = F4(42, 0, #{2 => value}),
 2326:     no_match = F4(42, a, #{2 => value}),
 2327: 
 2328:     F5 = fun(Term) ->
 2329:                  self() ! Term,
 2330:                  receive
 2331:                      #{[<<(3 bsr 30 + 2):0,$k:[]/signed-integer>>] := _} ->
 2332:                          ok;
 2333:                      0.5 ->
 2334:                          error
 2335:                  end
 2336:          end,
 2337:     error = F5(0.5),
 2338: 
 2339:     F6 = fun(Term) ->
 2340:                  self() ! Term,
 2341:                  receive
 2342:                      #{<<a/utf8>> := {a,b,c}} -> ok;
 2343:                      Other -> {error,Other}
 2344:                  end
 2345:          end,
 2346:     {error,any} = F6(any),
 2347: 
 2348:     F7 = fun(Term) ->
 2349:                  self() ! Term,
 2350:                  (?MODULE:all()):a(catch
 2351:                                        receive
 2352:                                            <<1.14:{<<"a":(tuple_size(1))>>}>> ->
 2353:                                                4;
 2354:                                            Other ->
 2355:                                                Other
 2356:                                        end)
 2357:          end,
 2358:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch F7(whatever)),
 2359: 
 2360:     ok.
 2361: 
 2362: t_duplicate_keys(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2363:     Map = #{ gurka => gaffel },
 2364:     Map = dup_keys_1(id(Map)),
 2365: 
 2366:     ok = dup_keys_1(#{ '__struct__' => ok }),
 2367: 
 2368:     ok.
 2369: 
 2370: dup_keys_1(Map) ->
 2371:     case Map of
 2372:         #{'__struct__' := _} ->
 2373:             case Map of
 2374:                 #{'__struct__' := _} ->
 2375:                     ok;
 2376:                 O1 ->
 2377:                     O1
 2378:             end;
 2379:         O2 ->
 2380:             O2
 2381:     end.
 2382: 
 2383: t_fold_3(_Config) ->
 2384:     Vs = lists:seq(1, 200),
 2385:     M0 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},I} || I<-Vs]),
 2386:     #{ {k,1} := 1, {k,200} := 200} = M0,
 2387:     Tot0 = lists:sum(Vs),
 2388:     Tot1 = maps:fold(fun({k,_},V,A) -> A + V end, 0, M0),
 2389:     true = Tot0 =:= Tot1,
 2390:     Tot2 = maps:fold(fun({k,_},V,A) -> A + V end, 0, maps:iterator(M0)),
 2391:     true = Tot0 =:= Tot2,
 2392: 
 2393:     %% error case
 2394:     ?badmap(a, fold, [_,0,a]) = catch maps:fold(fun(_,_,_) -> ok end, 0, id(a)),
 2395:     ?badarg(fold, [<<>>,0,#{}]) = catch maps:fold(id(<<>>),0,#{}),
 2396:     ok.
 2397: 
 2398: t_from_keys(_Config) ->
 2399:     Map0 = maps:from_keys(["a", 2, {three}], value),
 2400:     3 = map_size(Map0),
 2401:     #{"a":=value,2:=value,{three}:=value} = Map0,
 2402: 
 2403:     Map1 = maps:from_keys([1, 2, 2], {complex,value}),
 2404:     2 = map_size(Map1),
 2405:     #{1:={complex,value},2:={complex,value}} = Map1,
 2406: 
 2407:     Map2 = maps:from_keys([], value),
 2408:     0 = map_size(Map2),
 2409: 
 2410:     ?badarg(from_keys, [[a|b],value]) = catch maps:from_keys([a|b], value),
 2411:     ?badarg(from_keys, [not_list,value]) = catch maps:from_keys(not_list, value),
 2412:     ok.
 2413: 
 2414: t_map_2(_Config) ->
 2415:     Vs = lists:seq(1,200),
 2416:     M0 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},I}||I<-Vs]),
 2417:     #{ {k,1} := 1, {k,200} := 200} = M0,
 2418:     M1 = maps:map(fun({k,_},V) -> V + 42 end, M0),
 2419:     #{ {k,1} := 43, {k,200} := 242} = M1,
 2420:     M2 = maps:map(fun({k,_},V) -> V + 42 end, maps:iterator(M0)),
 2421:     #{ {k,1} := 43, {k,200} := 242} = M2,
 2422: 
 2423:     %% error case
 2424:     ?badmap(a, map, [_,a]) = catch maps:map(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id(a)),
 2425:     ?badarg(map, [<<>>,#{}]) = catch maps:map(id(<<>>), #{}),
 2426:     ok.
 2427: 
 2428: t_maps_take_2(_Config) ->
 2429:     {yes,Map0} = maps:take(a, #{a => yes, b => no}),
 2430:     true = Map0 =:= #{b => no},
 2431: 
 2432:     error = maps:take(a, #{b => no}),
 2433: 
 2434:     NotMap = not_map(b),
 2435:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,b},_}} = catch maps:take(a, b),
 2436: 
 2437:     ok.
 2438: 
 2439: not_map(Term) -> Term.
 2440: 
 2441: t_update_with_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2442:     V1 = value1,
 2443:     V2 = <<"value2">>,
 2444:     V3 = "value3",
 2445:     Map = #{ key1 => V1, key2 => V2, "key3" => V3 },
 2446:     Fun = fun(V) -> [V,V,{V,V}] end,
 2447: 
 2448:     #{ key1 := [V1,V1,{V1,V1}] } = maps:update_with(key1, Fun, Map),
 2449:     #{ key2 := [V2,V2,{V2,V2}] } = maps:update_with(key2, Fun, Map),
 2450:     #{ "key3" := [V3,V3,{V3,V3}] } = maps:update_with("key3", Fun, Map),
 2451: 
 2452:     %% error case
 2453:     ?badmap(b, update_with, [[a,b],a,b]) = catch maps:update_with([a,b], id(a), b),
 2454:     ?badarg(update_with, [[a,b],a,#{}]) = catch maps:update_with([a,b], id(a), #{}),
 2455:     ?badkey([a,b], update_with, [[a,b],Fun,#{}]) = catch maps:update_with([a,b], Fun,#{}),
 2456:     ok.
 2457: 
 2458: t_update_with_4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2459:     V1 = value1,
 2460:     V2 = <<"value2">>,
 2461:     V3 = "value3",
 2462:     Map = #{ key1 => V1, key2 => V2, "key3" => V3 },
 2463:     Fun = fun(V) -> [V,V,{V,V}] end,
 2464:     Init = 3,
 2465: 
 2466:     #{ key1 := [V1,V1,{V1,V1}] } = maps:update_with(key1, Fun, Init, Map),
 2467:     #{ key2 := [V2,V2,{V2,V2}] } = maps:update_with(key2, Fun, Init, Map),
 2468:     #{ "key3" := [V3,V3,{V3,V3}] } = maps:update_with("key3", Fun, Init, Map),
 2469: 
 2470:     #{ key3 := Init } = maps:update_with(key3, Fun, Init, Map),
 2471: 
 2472:     %% error case
 2473:     ?badmap(b, update_with, [[a,b],a,b]) = catch maps:update_with([a,b],id(a), b),
 2474:     ?badarg(update_with, [[a,b],a,#{}]) = catch maps:update_with([a,b], id(a), #{}),
 2475:     ok.
 2476: 
 2477: t_with_2(_Config) ->
 2478:     Ki = [11,22,33,44,55,66,77,88,99],
 2479:     M0 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},{v,I}} || I <- lists:seq(1, 100)]),
 2480:     M1 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},{v,I}} || I <- Ki]),
 2481:     M1 = maps:with([{k,I} || I <- Ki], M0),
 2482: 
 2483:     %% error case
 2484:     ?badmap(a, with, [[a,b],a]) = catch maps:with([a,b], id(a)),
 2485:     ?badmap(a, with, [{a,b},a]) = catch maps:with({a,b}, id(a)),
 2486:     ?badmap({0,<<>>,97}, with, [[],{0,<<>>,97}]) = catch maps:with([], {0,<<>>,97}),
 2487:     ?badmap({0,<<>>,97}, with, [[false, -20, -8],{0,<<>>,97}]) = catch maps:with([false, -20, -8], {0, <<>>, 97}),
 2488:     ?badarg(with, [a,#{}]) = catch maps:with(a,#{}),
 2489:     ok.
 2490: 
 2491: t_bif_map_find(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2492:     {ok, 1}     = maps:find(a, #{ a=> 1}),
 2493:     {ok, 2}     = maps:find(b, #{ a=> 1, b => 2}),
 2494:     {ok, "int"} = maps:find(1, #{ 1   => "int"}),
 2495:     {ok, "float"} = maps:find(1.0, #{ 1.0=> "float"}),
 2496: 
 2497:     {ok, "hi"} = maps:find("hello", #{ a=>1, "hello" => "hi"}),
 2498:     {ok, "tuple hi"} = maps:find({1,1.0}, #{ a=>a, {1,1.0} => "tuple hi"}),
 2499: 
 2500:     M0 = id(#{ k1=>"v1", <<"k2">> => <<"v3">> }),
 2501:     {ok, "v4"} = maps:find(<<"k2">>, M0#{ <<"k2">> => "v4" }),
 2502: 
 2503: 
 2504:     %% error case
 2505:     error = maps:find(a, #{}),
 2506:     error = maps:find(a, #{b=>1, c=>2}),
 2507:     error = maps:find(1.0, #{ 1 => "int"}),
 2508:     error = maps:find(1, #{ 1.0  => "float"}),
 2509:     error = maps:find({1.0,1}, #{ a=>a, {1,1.0} => "tuple hi"}), % reverse types in tuple key
 2510: 
 2511:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2512: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,find,_,_}|_]}} =
 2513: 			  catch maps:find(a, T)
 2514: 	      end),
 2515:     ok.
 2516: 
 2517: t_conflicting_destinations(_Config) ->
 2518:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
 2519:         catch do_conflicts(#{{tag,whatever} => true}),
 2520:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
 2521:         catch do_conflicts(#{[something] => 42}),
 2522:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
 2523:         catch do_conflicts(#{{tag,whatever} => true,
 2524:                              #{} => <<0>>,
 2525:                              [something] => 42}),
 2526:     ok.
 2527: 
 2528: do_conflicts(#{{tag,whatever} := true,
 2529:                #{} := <<bad_integer,0:(is_integer(a))>>} =
 2530:                  #{[something] := 42}) ->
 2531:     ok.
 2532: 
 2533: t_cse_assoc(_Config) ->
 2534:     {'EXIT',{{case_clause,#{key:=any}},_}} = catch do_cse_assoc(id(any)),
 2535: 
 2536:     {'EXIT',{{case_clause,#{key:=value}},_}} = catch do_cse_assoc(id(#{}), id(value)),
 2537:     42 = do_cse_assoc(id(#{assoc => 42}), id(any)),
 2538: 
 2539:     ok.
 2540: 
 2541: do_cse_assoc(V) ->
 2542:     case #{key => V} of
 2543:         #{assoc := Assoc} ->
 2544:             %% The CSE optimization would consider the first two arguments in
 2545:             %% the argument for `put_map` to be the key `alloc` and the value
 2546:             %% `#{}`.
 2547:             Assoc
 2548:     end.
 2549: 
 2550: do_cse_assoc(M, V) ->
 2551:     case M#{key => V} of
 2552:         #{assoc := Assoc} ->
 2553:             Assoc
 2554:     end.
 2555: 
 2556: shared_key_tuples(_Config) ->
 2557:     A = decimal(0),
 2558:     B = decimal(1),
 2559: 
 2560:     case ?MODULE of
 2561:         map_inline_SUITE ->
 2562:             %% With inlining, two separate map literals will be created. They
 2563:             %% will not share keys.
 2564:             ok;
 2565:         _ ->
 2566:             %% The two instances should share the key tuple.
 2567:             true = erts_debug:same(erts_internal:map_to_tuple_keys(A),
 2568:                                    erts_internal:map_to_tuple_keys(B))
 2569:     end,
 2570:     ok.
 2571: 
 2572: decimal(Int) ->
 2573:     #{type => decimal, int => Int, exp => 0}.
 2574: 
 2575: %% GH-6348/OTP-18297: Extend parallel matching of maps.
 2576: map_aliases(_Config) ->
 2577:     F1 = fun(M) ->
 2578:                  #{K := V} = #{k := {a,K}} = M,
 2579:                  V
 2580:          end,
 2581:     value = F1(id(#{k => {a,key}, key => value})),
 2582: 
 2583:     F2 = fun(#{} = #{}) -> ok end,
 2584:     ok = F2(id(#{})),
 2585:     ok = F2(id(#{key => whatever})),
 2586: 
 2587:     F3 = fun(#{a := V} = #{}) -> V end,
 2588:     {a,b,c} = F3(id(#{a => {a,b,c}})),
 2589: 
 2590:     F4 = fun(Map) ->
 2591:                  [#{Key := Value} | _] = [_ | Key] = id(Map),
 2592:                  Value
 2593:          end,
 2594:     bar = F4([#{foo => bar} | foo]),
 2595: 
 2596:     F5 = fun(Map) ->
 2597:                  {#{Key := Value}, _} = {_, Key} = id(Map),
 2598:                  Value
 2599:          end,
 2600:     light = F5({#{frotz => light}, frotz}),
 2601: 
 2602:     F6 = fun(E) ->
 2603:                  #{Y := _} = (Y = ((_ = X) = E))
 2604:          end,
 2605:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,0},_}} = catch F6(id(0)),
 2606:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,#{}},_}} = catch F6(id(#{})),
 2607:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,#{key := value}},_}} = catch F6(id(#{key => value})),
 2608: 
 2609:     ok.
 2610: 
 2611: coverage(_Config) ->
 2612:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,ok},_}} = catch coverage_1(),
 2613: 
 2614:     ok.
 2615: 
 2616: coverage_1() ->
 2617:     %% Cover beam_block:simplify_get_map_elements/4 when the type
 2618:     %% optimization pass is disabled.
 2619:     try #{ok := _V5, ok := _V4} = (maybe ok end) of
 2620:         #{ok := _V7, _V5 := _V7, ok := _V6, _V4 := _V6}  ->
 2621:             ok
 2622:     after
 2623:         ok
 2624:     end.
 2625: 
 2626: %% aux
 2627: 
 2628: rand_terms(0) -> [];
 2629: rand_terms(N) -> [rand_term()|rand_terms(N-1)].
 2630: 
 2631: rand_term() ->
 2632:     case rand:uniform(6) of
 2633: 	1 -> rand_binary();
 2634: 	2 -> rand_number();
 2635: 	3 -> rand_atom();
 2636: 	4 -> rand_tuple();
 2637: 	5 -> rand_list();
 2638: 	6 -> rand_map()
 2639:     end.
 2640: 
 2641: rand_binary() ->
 2642:     case rand:uniform(3) of
 2643: 	1 -> <<>>;
 2644: 	2 -> <<"hi">>;
 2645: 	3 -> <<"message text larger than 64 bytes. yep, message text larger than 64 bytes.">>
 2646:     end.
 2647: 
 2648: rand_number() ->
 2649:     case rand:uniform(3) of
 2650: 	1 -> rand:uniform(5);
 2651: 	2 -> float(rand:uniform(5));
 2652: 	3 -> 1 bsl (63 + rand:uniform(3))
 2653:     end.
 2654: 
 2655: rand_atom() ->
 2656:     case rand:uniform(3) of
 2657: 	1 -> hi;
 2658: 	2 -> some_atom;
 2659: 	3 -> some_other_atom
 2660:     end.
 2661: 
 2662: 
 2663: rand_tuple() ->
 2664:     case rand:uniform(3) of
 2665: 	1 -> {ok, rand_term()}; % careful
 2666: 	2 -> {1, 2, 3};
 2667: 	3 -> {<<"yep">>, 1337}
 2668:     end.
 2669: 
 2670: rand_list() ->
 2671:     case rand:uniform(3) of
 2672: 	1 -> "hi";
 2673: 	2 -> [1,rand_term()]; % careful
 2674: 	3 -> [improper|list]
 2675:     end.
 2676: 
 2677: rand_map() ->
 2678:     case rand:uniform(3) of
 2679: 	1 -> #{ hi => 3 };
 2680: 	2 -> #{ wat => rand_term(), other => 3 };  % careful
 2681: 	3 -> #{ hi => 42, other => 42, yet_anoter => 1337 }
 2682:     end.
 2683: 
 2684: do_badmap(Test) ->
 2685:     Terms = [Test,fun erlang:abs/1,make_ref(),self(),0.0/id(-1),
 2686: 	     <<0:1024>>,<<1:1>>,<<>>,<<1,2,3>>,
 2687: 	     [],{a,b,c},[a,b],atom,10.0,42,(1 bsl 65) + 3],
 2688:     [Test(T) || T <- Terms].
 2689: 
 2690: %% Use this function to avoid compile-time evaluation of an expression.
 2691: id(I) -> I.
